name: Beat it up!
description:
Beat it Up is an unique premium Music Game that mix two types of gameplay: Rhythmic Game and Beat’em up. 

In Beat it Up, you explore the city of Myami, a retro futuristic megalopolis where gangs rule. Stylishly, you beat the s*** out of everyone while listening to great tunes on your cassette player.

  • Play music to advance in the story and earn Experience and Money;
  • Buy new characters, songs, storylines and other assets; 
  • Grow your character in order to acquire new stuff;

Complete pitch: Pitch - Beat it Up - Google Slides
